ingredients: 1 head curly kale or bag of Kale
2 (14-ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
8 oz spicy fresh sausage, casings removed, crumbled
1 tsp kosher salt, plus more for seasoning
steps: While the soup is cooking, arrange the baguette slices on a rimmed baking sheet, brush with olive oil, season lightly with salt and pepper, then sprinkle the cheese evenly over the bread
Bake at 375F until the cheese is golden and melted and the bread is toasted (9-10 min)
title: Kale, Sausage, and White Bean Soup
